promoherobanner.description: Come back to Ohio Natural Gas and receive a $10 Visa® Reward Card.*
promoherobanner.title: Sign Up with ONG

offerpromotionconten.fineprinttext: * Offers are available only for new residential customers, who use 1,500 Ccf per year or less, using applicable promotion code. ONG service is available for eligible customers participating in the Energy Choice program through Duke Energy Ohio. ONG prices do not include taxes or local utility charges. For more information regarding terms and conditions, call 1.888.466.4427, write to Ohio Natural Gas, P.O. Box 14657, Cleveland, OH 44114, or visit onlyong.com. Early termination charges will apply for residential fixed price plans (12-month plan: $150/$75, Winter Fixed / 6-month plan: $75). Cannot be combined with any other offer. The Visa Reward Card is issued by and is the property of CenterState Bank of Florida, NA pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. and is subject to the issuer’s terms and conditions. Reward Cards will not have cash access and can be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted. All trademarks noted herein are held by their respective owners. © 2017 Ohio Natural Gas. All Rights Reserved.
offerpromotionconten.text:
Enroll Online for a $10 Visa® Reward Card!

How much are you paying for natural gas? We know you have a choice when it comes to your natural gas supplier, but when was the last time you shopped around for a better rate? Now is a great time to see what Ohio Natural Gas® has to offer because we’d love to have you back as a customer.

Program Terms and Conditions >
